kiwi.ui
Class KDesktopPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLayeredPane
                  javax.swing.JDesktopPane
                      kiwi.ui.KDesktopPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class KDesktopPane
extends javax.swing.JDesktopPane

A trivial extension of JDesktopPane that supports an opacity setting.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

paintComponent

protected void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics gc)
Paint the component. Delegates to superclass if the component is opaque.

isOpaque

public boolean isOpaque()
Get the opacity state of this component.

Returns:
true if this component is opaque, and false otherwise.

setOpaque

public void setOpaque(boolean opaque)
Set the opacity state of this component.

Parameters:
opaque - A flag specifying whether this component will be opaque.
